original_text: Then Jeroboam built Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim and lived there. And he went out from there and built Penuel.
korean_text: 여로보암이 에브라임 산지에 세겜을 건축하고 거기서 살며 또 거기서 나가서 부느엘을 건축하고

sentences.original_text: Then Jeroboam built Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여로보암이 에브라임 산지에 세겜을 세웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: And he went out from there
